entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is trying to find Malfoy on the map.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A Slytherin student who is being searched for by Harry Potter. His whereabouts are unknown.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: One of Malfoy's friends and a Slytherin student. He is often seen moving around the castle with Goyle.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Another friend of Malfoy's and a Slytherin student. He is often seen moving around the castle with Crabbe.

relationships.description: Harry Potter is trying to find Malfoy on the map, but he cannot locate him.
Crabbe and Goyle are often seen moving around the castle together.
